text: lidery shcho disbelieved sered yoho lyudey skazaly, "My dyvymosʹ shcho vy ne ye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchi yak ny, ta my dyvymosʹ shcho pershi lyudy proslidkuvaty za vy yavlyayete soboyu nayhirshi sered nas. My dyvymosʹ shcho vy ne volodiyete budʹ-yakoyu perevahoyu nad namy. Diysno, my dumayemo vy brekhuny
